item.title: Avatar World Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Avatar World provides players with a space for creativity while also allowing them to create and customize their own virtual characters. They can fully interact with various locations throughout the game too, but the most important one is their personal room. In this article, players can find a list of Avatar World codes that can be redeemed to get free interior items to decorate their rooms with.

Updated August 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are plenty of active codes in Avatar World right now, and all of them unlock new customization items. From simple accessories to full-themed outfits, there's a wide variety to choose from. These items don’t offer gameplay advantages but are great for anyone who enjoys personalizing their look. Since more codes may be added in future updates, it's a good idea to check back from time to time.

All Avatar World Codes

Working Avatar World Codes

  • WHITEXMAS — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • JOLLYPJS — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • STAYCOZY — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • COQUETTE — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • SPOOKHOME — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • LEOPURR — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • TINYBOO — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • MULTIPLAY — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • FAIRYDUST — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • HYDRATE — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • TOYCLUB — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • MOREJELLY — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • CLEANCARE — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • Thankyou — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • JELLY4TOD — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • Jellypop — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • NALITOS — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • PIZZANYA — Enter this code to claim various cool customization items.
  • COLORMEOW — Enter this code to claim a rainbow cat scarf, cat condos and cat accessory.
  • RBOWFREE — Enter this code to claim a rainbow gaming chair, rainbow shoulder bag, rainbow glasses.
  • RAINBGIFT — Enter this code to claim rainbow gaming headphones, rainbow T-shirt, and rainbow shorts.
  • RBSTYLE — Enter this code to claim a rainbow box with eye patches in the form of clouds, rainbow shoes, and a rainbow jacket.
  • ELIGAMER — Enter this code to claim rainbow gaming headphones with ears, white gaming headphones, yellow spray paint, green spray paint, rainbow gamepad, pink headband, scout neckband, and green skirt.
  • SOLFANS — Enter this code to claim a blue sweatshirt with clouds, a pink hairpin, pink shorts, a necklace, pink shoes, a 200,000 subscriber award, a cigarette, pink paint can, and a brown paint can.
  • LUNATICOS — Enter this code to claim devilish gaming headphones with horns, a necklace with the letter A, an orange headband, a purple phone, yellow shoes, a 100,000 subscriber reward, a boy devil figure, a girl devil figure, black jeans with patches, and a white hoodie.

Expired Avatar World Codes

  • rHEe9p73
  • w4YLHrfa6B
  • ErMu49w0DRK
  • L6bWH2TrjB

How to Redeem Codes In Avatar World

The process of redeeming codes in Avatar World is more creative than in other similar games. After you use the code, you go to your room and a drone comes with a present. You have to pick up the gift and open the box to get your reward. If you experience any problems with redeeming codes, you can refer to the instructions below:

  • First, launch Avatar World .
  • Then click on the purple store icon .
  • Scroll to the right to the end of the store.
  • Click on the Promo Code tab .
  • Select and copy one of the codes mentioned above.
  • Paste it into the Enter code field .
  • To receive the reward, press redeem and wait for the drone to arrive.

Avatar World is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Drive It 2 Player Obby Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Drive It 2 Player Obby Codes
  • How to Redeem Drive It 2 Player Obby Codes
  • How to Get New Drive It 2 Player Obby Codes

If you are looking for a fun Roblox experience for you and your friend, then Drive It 2 Player Obby is the perfect option. There, you will need to control a small car and you will have to synergize your actions if you want to succeed. Also, this experience features promo codes that provide you with some nice bonuses. Here, we will list all the Drive It 2 Player Obby codes and tell you how to redeem them.

Updated August 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Right now, there’s just one code available in Drive It 2 Player Obby , but it still provides a helpful mix of rewards. You can use it to claim both coins and revives, which may come in handy as you move through the game. While it’s not a huge bonus, it’s still worth redeeming. More rewards may be added in future updates, so be sure to check back later.

All Drive It 2 Player Obby Codes

Working Drive It 2 Player Obby Codes

  • Welcome – Gives you Coins and Revives.

Expired Driver It 2 Player Obby Codes

  • Thanksgiving – Gives you Coins and Revives.
  • FixedRevives – Gives you 5 Revives for free.

In order to play Drive It 2 Player Obby , you will need a friend. This feature makes the game different from most other Roblox experiences, as you can’t play it alone. The first player will have to steer the car, and the second one will control the brakes. Drive It 2 Player Obby codes can reward you with some nice bonuses that will help you make your progress easier.

Revives are one of the most valuable things in this game as they allow you to resurrect after a car crash and continue your journey. You can get some of them for free by redeeming promo codes and it is highly recommended that you use this bonus.

How to Redeem Drive It 2 Player Obby Codes

Codes in Drive It 2 Player Obby reward you with cool bonuses and if you want to redeem them, you will need to learn how this process works. Fortunately, it is quite simple and can be done in a few steps. Follow the instructions below to use Drive It 2 Player Obby codes and claim your bonuses:

  • Launch Drive It 2 Player Obby and wait for this Roblox game to load.
  • Once you are in the game, look at the left side of your screen. There you will need to find and click on the button that says “ABX”.
  • After that, enter the code you want to redeem in the menu that pops up.
  • Click on the Claim button.

How to Get New Drive It 2 Player Obby Codes

The developers of Drive It 2 Player Obby can create new Roblox codes and if this happens, this article will be updated to include them. You can bookmark our guide and use it as a source of information about Drive It 2 Player Obby codes. Also, you can follow the official media related to this Roblox experience:

  • Discord Server

September 1, 2006

item.title: Roblox: Dress to Impress Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Dress to Impress Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Dress to Impress

Dress to Impress is a beautifully designed game on the Roblox platform where you can express yourself and even compete with other players to see who is more creative and inventive. The main goal is to create a unique, garish, and impressive look for a fashion model to win the competition.

There are plenty of clothes and accessories that you can choose from to create an image, and you can even choose hair and makeup for the model separately. By redeeming Dress to Impress codes, you will receive unique clothes and accessories that you can put on the model and make her stand out from the crowd.

Updated August 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A brand-new code has been added to Dress to Impress , unlocking another stylish item for your collection. Alongside this, the current list includes a wide range of cosmetics like clothes, accessories, and themed outfits. These rewards offer great options for customizing your look in fun and creative ways. Keep checking back, as more codes may arrive with future updates.

All Dress to Impress Codes

Although the game has quite a lot of clothes and accessories that you can use for your model outfit, sometimes something is missing, and having a few exclusive items will be a great advantage. Fortunately, the game developers generously reward fans with such bonuses, and you can also get them by redeeming Dress to Impress codes. New codes appear occasionally, but their validity is limited, so be sure to redeem them as soon as possible.

Working Dress to Impress Codes

﻿

  • Vanillamace - Redeem this code to get Vanillamace Item. (NEW)
  • ANGELT4NKED - Redeem this code to get a Helmet.
  • PIXIIUWU - Redeem this code to get a Dress.
  • 3NCHANTEDD1ZZY - Redeem this code to get Rewards.
  • ELLA - Redeem this code to get Clothes.
  • 1CON1CF4TMA - Redeem this code to get Clothes.
  • B3APL4YS_D0L1E - Redeem this code to get a Doll.
  • MEGANPLAYSBOOTS - Redeem this code to get Boots.
  • CH00P1E_1S_B4CK - Redeem this code to get a Jacket, Skirt and Shoes.
  • D1ORST4R - Redeem this code to get a Bag.
  • S3M_0W3N_Y4Y - Redeem this code to get an Axe.
  • UMOYAE - Redeem this code to get a Dress.
  • BELALASLAY - Redeem this code to get a Jacket.
  • KITTYUUHH - Redeem this code to get Caseoh’s cat.
  • KREEK - Redeem this code to get a Hat.
  • LANATUTU - Redeem this code to get a dress.
  • ITSJUSTNICHOLAS - Redeem this code to get a black jacket.
  • M3RM4ID - Redeem this code to get a mermaid tail and skin.
  • C4LLMEHH4LEY - Redeem this code to get a dress and hat with ears.
  • IBELLASLAY - Redeem this code to get hair.
  • ASHLEYBUNNI - Redeem this code to get bunny slippers.
  • SUBM15CY - Redeem this code to get neckless and eyelashes.
  • LANA - Redeem this code to get top, shorts, and leg warmers.
  • TEKKYOOZ - Redeem this code to get the purse.
  • LANABOW - Redeem this code to get a bow.
  • LABOOTS - Redeem this code to get boots.
  • LEAHASHE - Redeem this code to get a sweatshirt and sweatpants.

Expired Dress to Impress Codes

  • FASHION
  • CUPIDSCLOUD
  • M0T0PRINCESSWAV
  • SWEETHEART
  • NY2025
  • 4BILLION
  • WINTERUPDATE
  • CHOOPIE10K
  • THEGAMES
  • REWARD4CLASS1C
  • DOLLISTA
  • DOLLISTAGRAM
  • CHERRY
  • VALENTINESDAY

How to Redeem Codes for Dress to Impress

Fortunately, redeeming Dress to Impress codes is not difficult and will take you a few seconds. There's no tutorial that will limit your access to redeeming codes, so you can do it as soon as you enter the game. If you have never redeemed a Dress to Impress code before, here's how to do it:

  • Launch Dress to Impress .
  • When you're in the lobby, look to the left side of the screen, you will see several interactive buttons.
  • Among them, find and click on the lowest one, an icon with three asterisks.
  • This will open the menu for redeeming codes, where you will see an input field and a button with a checkmark icon.
  • Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the active codes into the input field. All letters must be capitalized; otherwise, the system will consider the code invalid.
  • Once you have entered the code in the input field, click on the button with the checkmark icon to submit the reward request.
  • If everything is successful, a notification about the item or accessory you received, and its icon will appear in the middle of the screen.

If you want to wear the accessories or clothing you received by redeeming codes, you will need to go to the redemption tab, where all the items you obtained will be displayed.

item.title: Best Open-World Games For Feeling Like A Force Of Nature
item.description:
Summary

  • Breath of the Wild empowers players by offering tools that bend physics, making Link a force of nature.
  • Palworld allows players to dominate nature using Pals for various tasks beyond just battle.
  • Avowed gives players the role of The Envoy, tapping into nature's forces while communicating with an evil entity.

Open-world games can be freeing, but they can also be restraining. Some of the best ones can make players feel like they are beyond a character, like they are a force of nature and not just an avatar. They become something that should be feared, as if a name on the wind could spell doom for anyone who speaks it.

It’s a weird description and a very specific type of open-world game, and there aren’t many that can make players feel like this godly force. Do these games offer something beyond the tried-and-true open-world experience? Let’s dive in and rank them based on how powerful and tapped into nature players can truly feel.

The Legend Of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild

Link Plays With Physics

The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
10 /10
47
9.2 /10
Released
March 3, 2017

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E for Everyone: Fantasy Violence, Use of Alcohol, Mild Suggestive Themes
Powered by

The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild was a complete redo, mechanically, of the games that came before it. The open-world setting was bigger than it had ever been before, plus Link had access to a lot of initial tools that bent to the game’s physics. Players could freeze enemies, set grass on fire, and even use wind from these flaming fields to get an updraft and glide away. Link was stronger and more in tune with the elements than ever before, sort of like Hyrule’s one last hope at revival through a mystical force disguising itself as a young warrior.

Palworld

No Pals Are Safe

Palworld
132
8.6 /10
Released
January 19, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen Due To Violence
Powered by

Palworld is like Pokemon if Game Freak gave players 110% more creativity and flexibility with the mechanics. Catching monsters, or Pals, is still a core gameplay feature, but these creatures can be used in more ways than just battle. They can act as mounts or even build houses. With the help of Pals, players can conquer this massive map as if they are dominating nature itself by harnessing every element from wind to fire.

Avowed

One With Mushrooms

Avowed
7 /10
37
7.5 /10
Released
February 18, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ // Blood and Gore, Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

In Avowed , players will assume the role of The Envoy, who has come to a new land that is being overgrown by an evil entity. Said entity can be communicated with on an astral level, and players will have to learn when they should listen to their allies and this otherworldly force.

It’s a clever way to give players a voice for nature in the story while also granting them a lot of cool powers to keep combat engaging. The magic system is intuitive among Avowed’s many wands, books, and skill trees.

Ghost Of Tsushima

The Batman Of Feudal Japan

Ghost of Tsushima
9 /10
43
8.9 /10
Released
July 17, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language, Partial Nudity
Powered by

Ghost of Tsushima is set on the isle of Tsushima during one of the darkest eras of Japan's history: the Mongolian invasion. Jin is a samurai who is cast into hiding after losing to the Mongols. To win back the island, Jin will have to adapt the ways of the ninja to get an edge on his enemies.

Jin has no magical powers to harness nature, but he can use nature in other ways, like hiding in grass or diving on enemies from trees. The more players progress, the more fearsome Jin will become, a voice on the wind that spells doom, like some otherworldly ghost avenging the downtrodden.

Just Cause 2

Making Good Use Of Gadgets

Just Cause 2
8 /10
8.0 /10
Released
March 23, 2010

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ // Blood, Drug Reference, Language, Sexual Themes, Violence
Powered by

Just Cause 2 leveled up this franchise and established the hero, Rico, as an explosive force of the oppressed without a doubt. He’s sent to a new area where he has to take down a dictatorship with extreme prejudice. Players have an incredible variety of weapons, from machine guns to rocket launchers. However, the star of the show is the grappling hook, which players can use offensively and defensively. Between blowing up bases and rescuing civilians, Rico is as close to a superhero as the Just Cause series has.

Diablo 4

Beyond Good And Evil

Diablo 4
9 /10
100
7.5 /10
Released
June 6, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ // Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Language
Powered by

What’s great about the Diablo series is that humans are in a neutral zone between Heaven and Hell’s ongoing war. Neither side is fully good or evil, as players get manipulated by both in the series, including the latest entry, Diablo 4 .

This doesn’t matter though, because players are strong enough to take down hundreds of demons on their own, be it with magic or a few celestial punches like some one-man army. Players are like the champions of Earth and humanity, rising to counter Heaven and Hell.

Forspoken

The Ultimate Elemental Mage

Forspoken
6 /10
6.0 /10
Released
January 24, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

Forspoken is an Isekai setup wherein a New York woman, Frey, is whisked into a world of magic. She can start to use it with the help of a magical gauntlet. Powers will start small, but with each major boss that they defeat, players will unlock new skill trees and magic tiers like fire magic. There has never been a more impressive magic system than this, as every spell from a fireball to a water whip can make players feel immensely powerful. Frey is also quick on her feet, which will make exploring this open-world game a breeze.

Okami

The Sun Brings New Life

Okami
8.3 /10
Released
September 19, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Blood and Gore, Crude Humor, Fantasy Violence, Partial Nudity, Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco
Powered by

Okami is still fantastic to experience on the PS2, as it is on every system it was ported to after its initial release. It’s also the best example of becoming a force of nature, even though the open environments aren’t as big as some more modern games.

The hook will put players in the role of a wolf named Amaterasu, the goddess of the sun. As players vanquish demons from ancient Japan, they will restore nature to its former glory, often accompanied by beautiful cutscenes wherein flowers, grass, and trees bloom. If ever there was a poster game for Earth Day, Okami would be it.

item.title: Roblox: Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes
  • How to Redeem Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes
  • How to Get More Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

As the name suggests, Case Opening Simulator 2 invites players to open cases to get various items. Most of them are worth nothing, but some can be sold for a lot of Cash. But to get them, you must open paid cases. So in this guide, we will tell you about Case Opening Simulator 2 codes.

These Roblox codes can reward you with different amounts of Cash. This is especially useful if you have just started playing this simulator, as you will be able to open more expensive cases from the very beginning.

Updated August 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new reward is now available to redeem in Case Opening Simulator 2 . The latest code grants a simple cash bonus, giving you a bit more to work with in-game. It’s a small addition, but can still help you progress or experiment with new cases. More updates may arrive soon, so it’s a good idea to keep this guide bookmarked for the next batch of rewards.

All Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

Working Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

  • 44KLikes - Redeem this code to get Cash (NEW)

Expired Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

  • 40KLikes
  • 36KLikes
  • 34KLikes
  • 30KLikes
  • 26KLikes
  • 24KLikes
  • 23KLikes
  • 22KLikes
  • 19KLikes
  • 12KLikes

Among the many different types of cases in Case Opening Simulator 2 , there is a free one. Players can open it as many times as they want. However, the items that drop from it are quite cheap. So you need to start opening paid cases as soon as possible. Case Opening Simulator 2 codes will help you with this.

These codes are a great source of extra cash. And a few of them will allow you to open more than 10 rather expensive cases. However, the codes have a very short validity period. As soon as the developers release new goodies, old codes expire and their rewards become no longer available. So, make sure to use all active codes as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

To use Case Opening Simulator 2 codes, players only need to make a few clicks. The code redemption feature works here as simply as in most other Roblox titles. Follow these simple tips to redeem codes:

  • Launch Case Opening Simulator 2 .
  • Then, go to the Codes tab by clicking on the corresponding icon at the top of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code and click the Submit button to claim all the rewards.
  • It is important to note that Case Opening Simulator 2 is case-sensitive. So enter the codes exactly.

How to Get More Case Opening Simulator 2 Codes

Developers release new Roblox codes in Case Opening Simulator 2 after players reach certain milestones. So, in order not to miss them, you should visit the official social media of the game. There, players will find not only all the active codes but also news about updates or events:

  • Codrop Studio Discord Server
  • Codrop Studio Roblox Group
